item.description:
Now through May 14th - Reception April 26th
Edwin Esleeck was an accomplished professional photographer who taught photography classes at WAM from 1992 - 2008. While teaching, he continued to hone his own photographic vision shooting a wide range of subjects preferring locations in Maine and the western US.

Over 70 photographic prints of his works are on view in the Higgins Education Wing. Please join us for a reception - Sunday, April 26 - 2 PM-3:30 PM. Exhibit is open Monday - Friday 9 AM - 5 PM.

Learn More about this exhibit on our web site.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Ed Esleeck Photography Exhibit
